case.name: Fair Recruitment AI System
case.description: An assurance case demonstrating that an AI-powered recruitment system operates fairly and without discrimination in the hiring process.

tree.name: G1
tree.description: The AI recruitment system makes fair and non-discriminatory hiring recommendations.
context: Fairness is defined according to UK Equality Act 2010 protected characteristics (age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage, pregnancy, race, religion, sex, and sexual orientation).
The system processes 10,000+ applications monthly for entry-level software engineering positions in a context where diversity and inclusion are strategic priorities.
